SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT110
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This multiple message is sent by a drawer bank, or a bank acting on behalf of the drawer bank to the bank on which a/several cheque(s) has been drawn (the drawee bank).
It is used to advise the drawee bank, or confirm to an enquiring bank, the details concerning the cheque(s) referred to in the message.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency.
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U12
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid format! Format must be 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx' where x is any hexadecimal character (lower case only) and y is one of 8, 9, a, or b."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The repetitive sequence (Sequence B) must not be present more than ten times."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency code in the amount field 32a must be the same for all occurrences of this field in the message."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-52a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-52a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 72 Reject/Return: code word error, or mandatory code word missing, or code word not in the proper sequence, or format 6*35x not satisfied"

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-A With option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier), one of the following line formats must be used (Error code(s): T54): Line format 1 :/34x (Account) Line format 2 :4!a/2!a/27x (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. One of the following line formats must be used: /34x (Account) or 4!a/2!a/27x (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier)"

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-B
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-B In option F, when subfield 1 Party Identifier is used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format, one of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T55): ARNU, CCPT, CUST, DRLC, EMPL, NIDN, SOSE and TXID."
fieldvalidation.formula: Implies(B.F50a.FormatOption == 'F', Verify50FPartyIdCode($value)) /* get the code from party identifier if format is 4!a/2!a/27x */
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. When 'Party Identifier' is used with the format (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier), one of following codes must be used: ARNU, CCPT, CUST, DRLC, EMPL, NIDN, SOSE and TXID."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-C
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-D In option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier) used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. In option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier) used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-D
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-C With option F, subfield 2 (Name and Address), the following line format must be used for all lines: 1!n/33x (Number)(Details). (Error code(s): T54).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. With option F, subfield 2 (Name and Address), the following line format must be used for all lines :1!n/33x (Number)(Details)."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-E
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-E With option F - subfield 2 (Name and Address), should start with Number 1 to 8 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec (Error code(s): T56).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. With option F - subfield 2 (Name and Address), should start with Number 1 to 8 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-F
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-F Number 4 must be followed by a valid date in the format YYYYMMDD and this date, local to the sender, must not be later than the date on which the message is successfully sent to SWIFT (Error code(s): T50).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. Number 4 must be followed by a valid date in the format YYYYMMDD and this date, local to the sender, must not be later than the date on which the message is successfully sent to SWIFT."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-G
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-G Numbers 3, 5, 6 and 7 must be followed by a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. Numbers 3, 5, 6 and 7 must be followed by a valid ISO country code."

fieldvalidation.name: F-59a-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name_and_Address_Details' value. With option F - subfield 2 (Name_and_Address_Details), should start with Number 1 to 3 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec for field 59F."

fieldvalidation.name: F-59a-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address Details' value. With option F, subfield 2 (Name and Address Details), the following line format must be used for all lines :1!n/33x (Number)(Name and Address Details)."

fieldvalidation.name: F-59a-C
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name_and_Address_Details' value. Number 3 must be followed by a valid ISO country code."
